pullRequest.body:
Three small lemmata in support of further PNat proofs

Thanks for your contribution to mathlib! I have a few small comments, mostly about style.
I did not look at the proof carefully.

Thanks for your contribution to mathlib! I have a few small comments, mostly about style.
I did not look at the proof carefully.
We only use #aligns for code that was in mathlib3. Please remove these again.

```suggestion
theorem one_lt_of_lt {a b: ℕ+} (hab : a < b) : 1 < b := bot_le.trans_lt hab
```

Please put spaces around the colon. (Did you see the [style guide](https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/style.html) already? It explains this and many other things - by reading and following it, you can make your code get accepted faster - as reviewers don't have to point this out :-))
```suggestion
theorem one_lt_of_lt {a b : ℕ+} (hab : a < b) : 1 < b := by

While you're at it, could you please add lemmas for `a < a + b` (`lt_add_right`) and `b < a + b` (`lt_add_left`) as well? The proofs can reuse lemmas about `Nat`. Thank you!

bors d+
Will do later. I'm not done with `PNat`.

@urkud They are already in PNat:
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/blob/b119a280b5e1ea54d4b78fff2cedbbf5d3a4d81b/Mathlib/Data/PNat/Basic.lean#L251

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(PNat/Basic): add three lemmas
